鼳字的基本解释

鼳
jú
古书上说的一种大兽，形状像鼠，长着马蹄，重千余斤。

鼳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jú］
［《廣韻》古闃切，入錫，見。］
隐鼠的别名。见明李时珍《本草纲目·兽三·隐鼠》。

鼳字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【鼠字部】　鼳； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1529第06
【廣韻】【正韻】古闃切【集韻】【韻會】扃闃切，?音郹。【廣韻】鼠名。【爾雅·釋獸】鼳，鼠身，長須而賊，秦人謂之小驢。【註】似鼠而馬蹄，一歲千斤，爲物殘賊。

鼳字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鼳字的起名意思

暂无。

鼳
Basic explanation of words
鼳
jú
A big beast mentioned in ancient books, shaped like a mouse, with horseshoes, and weighing more than a thousand jins.
鼳
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jú］
["Guangyun" Gu Xie cut into tin, see. ]
An alias for Yinmo. See Ming Li Shizhen "Compendium of Materia Medica·Beast Three·Hidden Rat".
鼳
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Ji 2] [Mouse Character Department] 　鼳; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1529 Page 06
[Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Ancient Rhyme [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Fen Xie,? Yin Yun. 【Guangyun】The name of the rat. 【Erya·Shi Beast】Many, rat body, long beard and thief, Qin people call it a little donkey. [Note] Like a rat but a horseshoe, a thousand catties a year old, is a thief of remnants.
鼳
Source glyph

Taiwan Minutes
Hong Kong Mingti
Korean Ming Dynasty
鼳
Name meaning
Nothing.
jú
сущ.
1) мышь на копытах (из сказки)
2) крот
